system.description: Your comrade has been trained to assist you in medical procedures, enhancing your ability to treat multiple patients.
system.benefit: Comrade counts as an assistant trained in Medicae during Extended Care Medicae Tests. Medicae Tests suffer no penalty for additional patients.

specialAbilities.name: Trained Medical Assistant
specialAbilities.description: Your comrade counts as an assistant trained in Medicae during Extended Care Medicae tests.

specialAbilities.name: Multiple Patient Care
specialAbilities.description: Your Medicae tests suffer no penalty for additional patients.
